data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Bakool, Somalia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bakool, Somalia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Bakool.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7449 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 4 believers in Bakool to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Bakool, Somalia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Rahanweyn people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Rahanweyn people.
Lord, the believers in the state of Bakool, Somalia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 29,800 people living in Bakool, Somalia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Bakool, Somalia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
